name: Pixel Wizard Arena
description:
Pixel wizard arena is a 2D top-down action arena roguelite with focus on player-enemy interactions.

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Content:

  • 20 waves  (infinite)
  • 20 enemy types
  • 40 upgrades
  • 10 unlockable characters
  • Achievements
  • Many unique mechanics: lifesteal, pierce, distance based damage, aoe, culling strike, elements:fire/cold/poison, homing, etc.
  • 3 difficulties
  • 3 arena sizes
  • Automatic aim toggle (chill mode)

Currently, the game is in early access, audio will be added shortly, together with new textures.

But it does have a fully functioning save/load system.

Made by two students for their Bachelor thesis in 5 weeks (currently).
